name: "Something, Something, Something, Dark Side" Online Trivia | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: While Han and Luke waited to be rescued on the island of Hoth, in what commercial did Han act out scenes?
questions.explanation:
Juicy Fruit.

	After Han found Luke on the island of Hoth, he kept him warm in the stomach of a dead Tauntan. While waiting to be rescued, Han acted out the 1980's "Juicy Fruit" commercial in its entirety.

questions.text: When Luke was hanging from an antenna on the bottom of Cloud City, he called out for Leia, Obi-Wan Kenobi, and who else?
questions.explanation:
Tom Selleck.

	After losing his right hand in a fight with Darth Vader, Luke fell and ended up hanging from the bottom of Cloud City. Luke called out for Leia, Obi-Wan Kenobi and Tom Selleck. A scene from "Her Alibi" was shown where Tom Selleck thought he heard something and started looking around. Leia heard Luke's call and had Chewbacca turn around to save Luke.

questions.text: What music CD did Darth Vader want that belonged to the Emperor?
questions.correct: Richard Marx "Hold On To The Night"
questions.explanation:
Richard Marx "Hold On To The Night".

	When Darth Vader was summoned by the Emperor, he wanted to know if Darth Vader wanted any of the CD's he was giving away. The Emperor was putting some songs on his Ipod and was getting rid of the CD's he had. Darth Vader expressed interest in the Richard Marx CD. Taylor Swift's "Fearless" was never mentioned.

questions.text: After the power went out again on "Family Guy", Stewie referred to the power outage as living in what country?
questions.explanation:
Iraq.

	While watching Aaron Sorkin's new series "The Kitchen", the power goes out prompting the kids to ask Peter for another "Star Wars" story.

questions.text: While Luke trained with Yoda to prepare him to fight Darth Vader, with which "Rocky" movie were Luke's training scenes spliced?
questions.explanation:
Rocky IV.

	Luke's training scenes were spliced with Dolph Lundgren's training scenes in "Rocky IV". While Luke was out in the wilderness, Dolph was in a high tech training facility. Luke's training was reminiscent of Rocky's training in "Rocky IV".

questions.text: On the planet of Hoth, when Han Solo called out Princess Leia on her feelings for him, which "Star Trek" actor did Princess Leia say she would rather kiss than admit she had feelings for Han?
questions.explanation:
George Takei.

	George Takei played Helm Officer Hikaru Sulu in the original "Star Trek" series.

questions.text: During the opening crawl of "Episode V" what computer generated animal ran under one of the paragraphs?
questions.explanation:
Elephant.

	The last paragraph of the crawl tells viewers that the computer-generated elephant which meant nothing to the series cost $58,000 to put into the movie. In the pop-up version of the movie, Seth McFarlane wanted the most expensive elephant to add to the scene.

questions.text: When Luke found Yoda, what movie did Yoda first ask Luke if he had seen that would help him with the force?
questions.explanation:
Van Wilder.

	When Luke and R2D2 crashed on Dagobah and met Yoda, the first thing the master asked Luke was if he saw "Van Wilder". Yoda said the movie and the DVD extras would help Luke with the force.

questions.text: Which "Family Guy" character played Lando Calrissian?
questions.explanation:
Mort.

	Mort Goldman played Lando Calrissian. With "The Cleveland Show" in production, Seth MacFarlane wanted to use one of the characters from that series to play Lando. It didn't work out and Mort Goldman played Lando Calrissian.

questions.text: After Peter finished the story, he made fun of "Robot Chicken" again. When Chris didn't take the bait, Peter said he was going to tell the story of what movie?
questions.explanation:
Without A Paddle.

	All the movies mentioned starred Seth Green. Seth has played the voice of Chris Griffin since "Family Guy's" inception in 1999.
